title: Vector spaces over finite commutative rings
authors: Jun Guo, Junli Liu, Qiuli Xu
abstract:
Vector spaces over finite fields and Anzahl formulas of subspaces were
studied by Wan (Geometry of Classical Groups over Finite Fields, Science Press,
2002). As a generalization, we study vector spaces and singular linear spaces
over commutative rings and obtain some Anzahl formulas of subspaces. Moreover,
we discuss
  arcs and caps by using these formulas.
